GUI

类 MainGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.MainGUI

  • public class MainGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The main interface control, mainly to choose the game mode, access to the chess game player, and display the game interactive information. includes the Class BoardGUI

    BoardGUI
